person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In sentencing Darrel Voeks , 38 , to a 10-year prison term on Thursday , Outagmie County Circuit Court Judge Dennis Luebke said he was " a thief by habit . "

Let's think step by step.

1. Darrel Voeks - This is a proper noun and refers to a specific person, so it is a "Person" entity.
2. Outagmie County Circuit Court Judge Dennis Luebke - This is a title and a name, so it refers to a person. However, it is not clear if "Outagmie County Circuit Court Judge" is relevant to the context, so I would only identify "Dennis Luebke" as a "Person" entity.

In summary, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are "Darrel Voeks" and "Dennis Luebke".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Darrel Voeks
2. Dennis Luebke

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to a person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
